column4: on a fresh install, i feel like im at a mac, right clicking doesn't do anything on things i want it to
like this obnoxious bar on the left, how do i get rid of that
so use Gnome 3 or Xfce (my favorite) or KDE 4 or LXDE or plain blackbox/fluxbox/lightbox or MATE or Cinnamon. No shortage of choices at the moment - try stuff till you find something comfy!
gnome 2 is now gone - for something like it, try xfce or gnome 3 in fallback mode or MATE, which is a fork of gnome 2.
